MRZhou 0.1
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    GRS()
    Return the genetic risk scores
    GRS_drug()
    Return the genetic risk scores for drugs Mendelian
    GSMR()
    Return the GSMR analysis
    IVW_fix_random()
    Return the main four MR results
    MRpresso()
    Return the MR-Presso results of dat (after harmonization)
    SMR_analysis()
    Summary-data-based Mendelian Randomization(SMR) analysis
    calculate_LD()
    Generates a data frame of pairwise linkage disequilibrium statistics
    circle_plot()
    Return a circle plot
    coloc_local()
    Prepare datasets to Bayesian colocalisation analysis using Bayes Factors
    combine_results()
    Combination the result,test,presso results
    forest_plot()
    Return the forest plot
    get_f()
    Return the IVs (F>10)
    get_rsID_from_chrpos()
    How to get rsID from chromosome and position
    mr_test()
    Return the Cochran’s Q heterogeneity test and directional pleiotropy test
    paper_table()
    Return the main MR analysis results including:TableS1-3
    read_finngen_exposure()
    Return exposure when using the finngen database
    read_finngen_outcome()
    Return outcome when using the finngen database
    read_vcf()
    Read IEU GWAS database vcf files (original)
    smr_data()
    SMR data prepration
    smr_plot()
    SMR plot
    snp_add_eaf()
    How to find allele frequency, proxy of a given SNP
    snp_phenoscanner()
    How to search pleiotropy for a given SNP
    volcano_plot()
    Return a volcano plot
